W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_000_DETAIL.text: You found someone who isn't frozen.

W12_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_010_DETAIL.text: You've obtained another triangle. It's time to leave this world.

W12_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: After walking through the door, you find yourself in a world where everything is frozen. You should seek out someone who isn't and see if they can help you find a triangle.
